channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19531] TransactionalValidationListener is getting catalog name from conf instead of table object.
item.description: TransactionalValidationListener.validateTableStructure get the catalog from the conf file rather than taking it from the passed in table structure.  This causes createTable operations to fail.
item.summary: TransactionalValidationListener is getting catalog name from conf instead of table object.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Deferring this to next release. We can do this in bug fix release.

-1 overall
